name: Promotion (Amstrad)
description:
Introduction

The original Amstrad CPC's game now on itch.io. This game ended up in 4th place on the  CPCRetrodev 2020 contest. Playable on browsers thanks to Tiny Emulators.

Target

You must reach the last floor to become the new boss. In order to do that, you have to defeat all the foes on your way. The rest of the employees will want to stop you, So, don’t let them catch you! Do your best!

BTW, check out our Discord group if you want to find other games and events to take apart!

Controls
  • O = Left
  • P = Right
  • Q = Jump
  • SPACE = Shoot
  • DEL = Pause
  • ESC = Reset game

On the start screen you can press C to redefine controls.
